Package models

Class Stock

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Stock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockInterface
    public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockInterface
    Represents a stock with details about a company's shares, including the company name, volume, local high and low prices, and user-shared information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Stock​(java.lang.String companyName, long userShared)
      Constructs a new Stock with the specified company name and the number of shares by the user.
